content: Is there a prototype (or slide deck) of what a SMART authorization UX might look like for a Patient and their portal-EHR or standalone-PHR?

I know there are examples out there showing what auth pages look like today for apps that use the data from their EHR/PHR. I will say, generally, that I don't see authorization requested for the specific Portal itself assuming it's part of the BA/considered part of the EHR.
Let me see if I can find links to some of the prior examples
thanks. I can imagine, but want a better UX for my tutorial for Sydney
Have you looked at the SMART launcher UX (http://launch.smarthealthit.org/) ? Or the S4S demo portal (https://imaging.demo.syncfor.science/)
They each have an open source implementation with a UI showing an authorization screen
